en-US: Sometimes the internet just decides to take a coffee break, leaving your page stranded. Or maybe the it broke itself just because it felt like it. who knows? Double-check your network, give the page a pep talk, and hit refresh!
zh-CN: 有时候网络会偷偷溜出去喝咖啡，页面就被晾在一边了。也可能页面自己闹脾气，突然罢工。请检查一下你的网络，给页面打打气，然后刷新试试看吧！
